name: Kalyani Mohite
headline: Data Analyst | SQL, Python, Power BI | MS CS @ GMU (May 2025)
summary: Computer Science graduate passionate about data analysis and building meaningful solutions. Enjoys working at the intersection of logic and creativity, creating dashboards, analyzing patterns, and developing apps that improve everyday tasks. Specializes in Python ETL pipelines, SQL optimization, dashboard development with Power BI and Tableau, and modern web applications using Next.js. Experienced with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and machine learning workflows including LLMs and embeddings.

experience.title: Data Analyst
highlights: Migrated & modeled 1 TB marketing + CRM data on AWS S3/Redshift/dbt; improved campaign ROI by 20%
Built Python ETL & optimized SQL scripts; +30% throughput, -40% manual effort
Collaborated on churn models (RF, LR) achieving 85%+ accuracy

Documented workflows & insights; supported 200+ data-driven decisions/quarter
